cnbc.summary: The central bank is poised to deliver its third straight interest rate cut Wednesday, while firing a warning shot about what's ahead.

cnbc.title: Hassett likely next Fed chair, but most think Trump should nominate someone else, CNBC Fed survey shows
cnbc.summary: The December survey shows 84% believe President Trump will tap Hassett, director of the National Economic Council, to head the central bank.

cnbc.title: Oracle's AI-fueled debt load has investors on edge ahead of quarterly earnings
cnbc.summary: Oracle's fiscal second-quarter results will be a crucial test for the AI trade and whether demand justifies the company's buildout plans.

cnbc.title: Trump trade rep changes China soybean purchase timeline, cites 'discrepancy'
cnbc.summary: China for months earlier this year had boycotted purchasing soybeans from U.S. farms because of a trade war began by President Donald Trump.

cnbc.title: Hinge founder leaves CEO role to launch AI-powered dating startup
cnbc.summary: Hinge founder Justin McLeod is stepping down as CEO to launch an AI-powered dating service called Overtone.

cnbc.title: Watch: Trump delivers speech on the economy in Pennsylvania as cost concerns grow
cnbc.summary: The Pennsylvania trip marks a return to the sort of voter outreach that defined Trump's political campaigns, but has grown rarer during his second term so far.

cnbc.title: OpenAI hires Slack CEO Denise Dresser to lead global revenue strategy
cnbc.summary: Dresser was named Slack's chief executive in 2023 after spending more than a decade at Salesforce.

cnbc.title: Trump administration moves to remove millions of student loan borrowers from payment pause
cnbc.summary: The Trump administration announced a proposed joint settlement with Missouri that would soon force millions of student loan borrowers into repayment.

cnbc.summary: Target's remodeled store opens as the company tries to get back to growth and attract sales during the critical holiday season.

cnbc.title: Eli Lilly to build $6 billion manufacturing plant in Alabama to help make upcoming obesity pill, other drugs
cnbc.summary: That added production capacity for Eli Lilly's obesity pill, orforglipron, is crucial as the company races to file for its approval.
